content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. What price were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 400 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I'm looking for a higher offer. The location and amenities of the apartment are quite premium. Can you consider a higher bid?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, I am willing to pay 450 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your consideration. While 450 Euro is a step in the right direction, I still believe the apartment is worth more. Would you be willing to go up to 500 Euro per month? This would reflect the true value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I agree to the price of 480 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that offer. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location, and I'm confident that someone will appreciate its value and be willing to pay a higher price. If you're not interested in paying more, I'll have to consider other potential tenants.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty. If you change your mind or are willing to reconsider, please let me know. In the meantime, I'll continue to seek a tenant who is willing to pay the fair market value for this exceptional apartment. Thank you for your time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
